appetizers.name: Chicken Tenders
appetizers.description: Tender, boneless chicken strips cooked to perfection. Choice of honey mustard, ranch, bbq, or sweet chili on the side. Also available buffalo style

appetizers.name: Mozzarella Sticks
appetizers.description: Mozzarella dipped in bread crumbs and fried. Served with homemade marinara sauce

appetizers.name: Potato Skins
appetizers.description: Topped with cheddar jack cheese, scallions, and smoked bacon. Add chili for 2.00

appetizers.name: Homemade Hummus
appetizers.description: A great vegetarian delight. Served with fresh pita bread, carrots, and celery sticks

appetizers.name: Fried Pickles
appetizers.description: Pickle chips lightly battered and fried to a golden brown. Served with ranch dressing

appetizers.name: Chips & Guacamole
appetizers.description: House made guacamole served with our fresh fried tortilla chips

appetizers.name: Cheese Fries
appetizers.description: House fries topped with cheddar jack cheese and served with gravy dipping for dipping delight Add bacon 2.00

appetizers.name: Beantown Nachos
appetizers.description: A mountain of crisp tortilla chips piled high with salsa, melted cheese, sour cream, onions, jalapenos, and scallions. Add a generous scoop of chili or chicken for 4.00

appetizers.name: Beantown Baked Beans
appetizers.description: An old Boston recipe served with brown bread

appetizers.name: Famous Fries
appetizers.description: Our famous steak fries cooked to a perfect golden brown. Served with your choice of dipping sauce

appetizers.name: Baked Jumbo Pretzel
appetizers.description: Just like the ones in the park. Served with honey mustard

appetizers.name: Haddock Bites
appetizers.description: Fresh haddock battered and fried. Served with tartar sauce

appetizers.name: Tater Kegs
appetizers.description: Jumbo tater tots stuffed with bacon and cheddar cheese, served with side of ranch dressing

appetizers.name: Fried Shrimp
appetizers.description: Shrimp delicately battered and breaded. Served with honey mustard

specials.name: Yankee Pot Roast
specials.description: Slow roasted beef and traditional vegetables served over potatoes and a jus

specials.name: North End Italian Sausage
specials.description: Handmade Italian sausage made daily in the North End. Onions and peppers on a lightly buttered roll served with your choice of side

soups.name: Homemade Chili
soups.description: Fresh ground sirloin, tomatoes, peppers, onions & beans. All this flavor topped with melted cheese Tortilla chips included for scooping

soups.name: Beantown Clam Chowder
soups.description: Hearty bowl of our world famous clam chowder

salads.name: Steak Tip Salad
salads.description: Our fresh garden salad topped with our famous marinated steak tips

salads.name: Garden Salad
salads.description: Mixed greens, fresh tomatoes, Bermuda onions, crisp cucumbers, carrots, and pepperoncinis

salads.name: Mediterranean Salad
salads.description: Mixed greens, tomato, onion, cucumber, carrots, pepperoncinis, olives, and feta

salads.name: Caesar Salad
salads.description: Crisp romaine lettuce and garlic bread croutons topped with parmesan cheese and tossed in a classic caesar dressing

entrees.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
entrees.description: A medley of fresh stir fry vegetbles in a light teriyaki sauce served over rice. Add chicken for 4.00

entrees.name: New England Fried Chicken
entrees.description: Bonless chicken breast lightly battered and cooked to a golden brown. Served with mashed potatoes, vegetables, cranberry sauce, and scrumptous homemade gravy

entrees.name: Made to Order Mac & Cheese
entrees.description: Add bacon 2.00. Add grilled chicken 4.00. Add lobster market price

entrees.name: *Marinated Steak Tips
entrees.description: Choice cuts of lean sirloin grilled to your liking. Served with today's vegetable and a side of your choice

entrees.name: Fish & Chips
entrees.description: Fresh haddock, fried to a golden brown and served with homemade coleslaw and fries

entrees.name: Firecracker Shrimp
entrees.description: Golden brown fried shrimp dusted in our spice mix and french fries drizzled in firecracker sauce. Served with coleslaw

entrees.name: Chicken Tender Platter
entrees.description: Fresh chicken tenders fried golden brown and served with fries and coleslaw

entrees.name: Chicken Parmesan
entrees.description: A large breast of chicken delicately breaded, lightly fried, topped with marinara sauce and mozzarella and server over the pasta of the day

entrees.name: Broiled Haddock Plate
entrees.description: Fresh grilled with sauteed veggie of the day. Served with cole slaw and a side of sweet chili sauce

sandwiches.name: Jumbo Lobster Role
sandwiches.description: Choice of tender, sweet lobster meat tossed lightly in mayo served with lettuce on a toasted buttered roll. Comes with french fries and homemade coleslaw

sandwiches.name: Lobster Grilled Cheese
sandwiches.description: Fresh North Atlantic lobster on your choice of whie, wheat, or rye bread with American, cheddar, swiss, pepperjack, or provolone cheese

sandwiches.name: Traditional B.L.T
sandwiches.description: An American classic! Bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on your coice of white, wheat, or rye bread

sandwiches.name: The Big Cheese
sandwiches.description: Traditional grilled cheese sandwich. Choice of white, wheat, or rye bread and American, cheddar, Swiss, pepperjack, or provolone cheese. Additions available for 99¢: Tomato, bacon, ham, sauteed onions

sandwiches.name: Slow Roasted Turkey Club
sandwiches.description: Fresh carved turkey breast with lettuce, tomato, and bacon

sandwiches.name: Sam Adams
sandwiches.description: Grilled cajun chicken breast topped with melted Vermont cheddar cheese and dressed with lettuce, tomato, and a dijon mayo blend

sandwiches.name: Fish Tacos
sandwiches.description: 3 Tacos. Fresh fried haddock served on caramelized onion naan with fresh pico de gailo and cabbage, drizzled with our house aioli. Side not included

sandwiches.name: Paul Revere
sandwiches.description: Hand cut Romanian pastrami, corned beef, Swiss cheese, Bermuda onions and honey dijon mustard

sandwiches.name: *Mother Goose
sandwiches.description: Sauteed, marinated, sirloin steak tips smothered with sauteed peppers, onions, and melted Vermont cheddar

sandwiches.name: Honey Chicken Sandwich
sandwiches.description: Fried chicken breast topped with pepperjack cheese, honey, spicy mustard, and pickle chips. On a brioche bun

sandwiches.name: Fried Chicken Sandwich
sandwiches.description: Fresh chicken breast fried golden brown, served with lettuce, tomato, and onion on a brioche bun

sandwiches.name: Fenway Franks
sandwiches.description: Two all beef hot dogs and grilled buns, just like at the park!

sandwiches.name: Classic Reuben
sandwiches.description: Choice of corned beef or pastrami piled high with Swiss cheese and 1,000 island dressing

sandwiches.name: Rocado Sandwich
sandwiches.description: Toasted multigrain panini with avado, roasted red peppers, pico de gailo, and fresh pesto. Vegan friendly!

burgers.name: Famous Beantown Burger
burgers.description: ½lb fresh filet mignon, short rib & chuck, topped with bacon, choice of cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, homemade fried pickle chips, and our signature sauce. All this on a garlic butter roll

burgers.name: Handmade Turkey Burger
burgers.description: Fresh ground turkey breast, grilled and served with lettuce, tomato, and onion on a freshly baked roll. Topped with your choice of cheese

burgers.name: Handmade Cheese Burger
burgers.description: ½Lb USDA choice beef served with lettuce, tomato, and onion topped with choice of cheese on a freshly baked roll. Add sauteed onions or mushrooms for just 50¢ each or bacon for 1.00

burgers.name: Guacamole Burger
burgers.description: ½Lb hand packed beef patty topped with guacamole, pepperjack cheese, jalapenos, and chipotle aioli

items.name: Boneless Chicken Tenders

items.name: Popcorn Chicken
items.description: Crispy bite sized nuggets cut from all white meat chicken breast

items.name: Skewered Steak/Chicken Teriyaki
items.description: Juicy steak or chicken threaded onto skewers marinated in a tangy teriyaki sauce

items.name: Sliders

items.name: Homemade Rangoons
items.description: Select from: Plain, Crab or Buffalo Chicken

items.name: Crab Cakes
items.description: Fresh crabmeat pan seared and served with our lemon aioli sauce

items.name: Jalapeno Poppers
items.description: Jalapeno peppers stuffed with cheddar cheese mixture then battered and deep fried to make delicious little appetizers, served with blue cheese

items.name: Fried Mozzarella
items.description: Lightly breaded and cooked to a golden brown, served with our homemade marinara sauce

items.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
items.description: Button mushrooms baked with fresh crabmeat

items.name: Spinach & Artichoke Dip
items.description: Warm and cheesy spinach artichoke dip served with corn tortilla chips

items.name: Vegetable Platter
items.description: Selection of fresh vegetables served with our veggie dipping sauce

items.name: Chicken, Broccoli, and Ziti
items.description: Tubular ziti pasta in a rich alfredo cream sauce with sliced chicken breast and broccoli

items.name: Chicken Parmesan
items.description: A large breast of chicken delicately breaded, lightly fried, topped with marinara sauce and mozzarella and server over your choice of pasta

items.name: Chicken Marsala
items.description: A flavorful meal of boneless, skinless chicken breast sauteed in a rich Marsala wine sauce with mushrooms and and shallots

items.name: Chicken Piccata
items.description: A comforting Italian classic made with chicken breast sautéed with lemon, butter, white wine and capers

items.name: Baked Stuff Shells
items.description: Three cheese baked stuff jumbo shells in a marinara sauce

items.name: Shrimp Scampi
items.description: Tender shrimp sauteed with garlic, white whine, lemon butter, and herbs served over pasta

items.name: Steak or Chicken Stir Fry
